title: Open Wide
description:
Open wide for today's episode, with stories that take place in the middle of nowhere, or about what's behind the closed door, or what's crawling in your mouth. First, Sapphire shares a tale about a grotesque scarecrow in a field. Then, you'll visit an old farm house infested with bugs, listen to a voice behind a door, spot mysterious figures in public, and investigate an abandoned well.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
